    • Uses of SingleVariableConstraint in com.sri.ai.grinder.api

      Methods in com.sri.ai.grinder.api that return SingleVariableConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SingleVariableConstraint SingleVariableConstraint.clone() 
      default SingleVariableConstraint SingleVariableConstraint.conjoin(Expression formula, Context context) 
      static SingleVariableConstraint SingleVariableConstraint.make(Theory theory, Expression variable, Expression formula, Context context)
      Returns a SingleVariableConstraint on a given variable, according to a given theory, equivalent to given formula -- the formula object itself is returned if it happens to be a SingleVariableConstraint on same variable and theory.
      SingleVariableConstraint SingleVariableConstraint.makeSimplificationWithoutExternalLiterals()
      Creates a simplification of this constraint that is equal to it but for the absence of external literals.
      default SingleVariableConstraint Theory.makeSingleVariableConstraint(Expression variable, Context context)
      Make a new single-variable constraint for this theory.
      SingleVariableConstraint Theory.makeSingleVariableConstraintAfterBookkeeping(Expression variable, Context context)
      Implements how to make a new single-variable constraint for this theory after bookeeping.
      static SingleVariableConstraint SingleVariableConstraint.makeSingleVariableConstraintFromFormula(Expression variable, Expression formula, Context context) 
      static SingleVariableConstraint SingleVariableConstraint.useFormulaIfItIsASingleVariableConstraintForTheRightTheory(Expression variable, Expression formula, Theory theory) 
      Methods in com.sri.ai.grinder.api with parameters of type SingleVariableConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver Theory.getSingleVariableConstraintModelCountingStepSolver(SingleVariableConstraint constraint, Context context)
      Given a single-variable constraint in this theory, returns a ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver computing its model count.
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver Theory.getSingleVariableConstraintSatisfiabilityStepSolver(SingleVariableConstraint constraint, Context context)
      Given a single-variable constraint in this theory, returns a ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver deciding its satisfiability.

    • Uses of SingleVariableConstraint in com.sri.ai.grinder.core.constraint

      Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.core.constraint that implement SingleVariableConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSingleVariableConstraint
      An abstract Expression with efficient internal representation for a conjunction in a given theory.
      class  AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithDependentNormalizedAtoms
      An implementation of AbstractSingleVariableConstraint for theories in which there is interaction between normalized atoms.
      class  AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithIndependentNormalizedAtoms
      An extension of AbstractSingleVariableConstraint for theories in which there is no interaction between distinct normalized atoms.

      static Context MultiVariableContextWithCheckedProperty.makeAndCheck(Theory theory, SingleVariableConstraint head, Context tail, MultiVariableContextWithCheckedProperty.ContextDependentProblemStepSolverMaker contextDependentProblemStepSolverMaker, Context context)
      Creates a new Context from a SingleVariableConstraint and a Context, by either returning a contradiction if either is contradictory, or a new MultiVariableContextWithCheckedProperty otherwise.

      Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.base that implement SingleVariableConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithBinaryAtoms
      An abstract single-variable constraint solver providing functionality for theories involving only binary atoms.

      An extension of AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithBinaryAtoms for theories including equality.
      class  SingleVariableConstraintForTheoryWithoutAtoms
      An implementation of SingleVariableConstraint for theories that define no atoms.
